downloadTitle: Monotype iType font engine for Windows Embedded CE 6.0 R2
downloadDescription: Monotype provides a 3rd party component text rendering solution for Windows Embedded CE 6.0 R2. The iType® font engine is a small-footprint font rendering subsystem that brings the benefits of scalable type and high-quality multilingual font display to embedded, memory-constrained environments.
detailsSection:
Developers gain access to a wide range of multilingual fonts as well as innovations such as support for font linking, which improves memory efficiency when handling multiple font files,
and SmartHint™ technology, which enables East Asian text to remain clear and legible, even when scaled to small sizes.

The iType font engine helps Windows Embedded CE developers 'fast forward' their projects to gain a competitive edge.
They can take advantage of scalable technology and fonts that support virtually any major language of the world.
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows Vista, Windows 2000 Service Pack 4, Windows XP Service Pack 3


• Hardware requirements:

o PC with 933 MHz or faster processor. 2 GHz recommended
o 512 MB of RAM; 1GB recommended
o 18 GB of available space on installation drive
o 1 GB of available space on system drive
o DVD-ROM drive
o Monitor that supports 1024 x 768 screen resolution with 16-bit color


• Required Software:

o Windows Embedded CE 6.0
o Visual Studio 2005 (except Express)
o Visual Studio 2005 Service Pack 1
o Visual Studio 2005 Service Pack 1 Update for Windows Vista (if applicable)
o Windows Embedded CE 6.0 SP1 (required if PB 6.0 Tools have been installed)
o Windows Embedded CE 6.0 R2
o Windows Embedded CE 6.0 R3
installInstructionSection:
Click the file you want to download and then do one of the following:

1. To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run now.
2. To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
3. Uncompress .zip file
4. Run setup.exe
additionalInformationSection:
Windows Embedded CE 6.0 Evaluation Edition

Microsoft Expression Blend 2

QQ Messenger Client for Windows Embedded CE 6.0 R3

Viewers 97 or 2003 & 2007 for Windows Embedded CE 6.0 R3
